title: New: Bad Sounds – Living Alone
content:
Entering in a veil of mystery, Bad Sounds are a brand new duo from London that have immediately impressed with their debut track ‘Living Alone’.

Channeling sounds akin to Tom Vek and Metronomy, there is, as you would expect, very little further information about the band currently available. However with the immediate support of BBC Radio 1, there is no doubt that we’re sure to find out more about Bad Sounds as their impact continues to ripple across the blogosphere and beyond.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d0e
